DOC.brief_summary: To assess the tolerability of switching from Depakote Sprinkle Capsules or Depakote tablets to Depakote ER tablets in the pediatric population.
DOC.brief_title: Pediatric Switch Study for Children and Adolescent Patients With Epilepsy
DOC.criteria: Male or female patient with a clinical diagnosis of epilepsy considered stable by the investigator. Must be in good physical health, on the same dose of all medications, including Depakote and other AEDs, for 2 week period prior to randomization. Minimum body weight of 37 lbs. Sixmonth history of drug or alcohol abuse. Status epilepticus within 6 months prior to screening. Abnormal platelet or ALT/AST levels.
